title: Within the last few days, my phone (original Pixel XL) has started turning the media volume to max
content:
The media volume on my phone keeps setting itself to the maximum level. It does this repeatedly on loop. 

I will be scrolling through twitter, or messaging someone and suddenly the volume "slider" pops up and the volume goes to max. If i drag it down, it immediately goes back to maximum. 

Has anyone had this and managed to get it to stop?
